#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
     int t,i,j;
     cin>>t;
     while(t--)
     {
     string a,b;
     int flag1=0,flag2=0;
     cin>>a>>b;
     int l=a.length();
     int l1=b.length();
     int in1=0,in2=l1-1;
     
     for(i=0;i<l;i++)
     {
          if(a[i]==b[in1] && in1<l1)
         {     in1++;
              //cout<<in1<<" ";           
                }
          if(a[i]==b[in2] && in2>=0)
         {  
          in2--;
          //cout<<in2<<endl; 
            }
        }
       if(in1==l1 && in2==-1)
       cout<<3;

       cout<<1;

       cout<<0;
       cout<<endl;
       }
